World Religions & Beliefs.name: World Religions & Beliefs Quiz 39
World Religions & Beliefs.description: This is a quiz about World Religions & Beliefs.

questions.text: By what collective name do Christians refer to God the Father, God the Son and the Holy Ghost?
Girls of what religious community traditionally wear bonnets?
Who is the patron saint of animals?

Which of these is not a Hindu deity?
What disease is sometimes referred to as the 'royal disease'?
What is the last book of the New Testament?
From whom does the Lutheran Church get its name?
